name: Jagan Gemini Formatter
description:
Start speaking with "I want to create..." and your voice input will be processed and formatted using the Gemini API.
Inspired by Mr. Jagan request.
instructions:
Get your Gemini API key: https://aistudio.google.com/api-keys.

The prompt should include {text}, which will be replaced with your request after removing the trigger phrase.

settings.name: prompt
settings.label: Prompt
settings.default:
Clean up grammar, fix syntax, and return concise structured output (non-markdown).
Only output structured plain-text result and ready to paste.
Use the user request below.

Request:
{text}
settings.help_text: The substring {text} will be replaced by the captured request (after the trigger).
